text: The East Lancs Omnitown was a single-decker body of a bus, It had a low-floor, It was built in 2004 by East Lancashire Coachbuilders and Scania. It was only built on the Scania N94UB chassis. In 2007 it was replaced by the double- decker Scania OmniCity and the single-decker East Lancs Esteem. ==References== ==Other websites== * OmniTown Category:Low-floor buses
title: East Lancs OmniTown
